algorithm: This algorithm prioritizes items with larger volume to fill the container quickly, selects the best placement based on maximizing space utilization and minimizing gaps, and manages container separation constraints.

This algorithm prioritizes placing the largest remaining item type into either an existing truck or, if not possible, a new truck, attempting to place the item in orientations that maximize space utilization while respecting separation constraints.
This algorithm iteratively places the largest volume item in the tightest-fit position within existing trucks or a new truck, prioritizing space utilization and separation constraints.
This algorithm prioritizes items with smaller dimensions to pack densely, increasing the weight of space utilization in the scoring function and decreasing the weight of touching sides.

This algorithm prioritizes placing items in existing trucks, selecting the item with the highest remaining quantity and favoring positions that maximize contact with existing items while minimizing wasted space.
